page.title: 10Housing Estate, Bettws
page.content: When a large housing estate was planned about{1960,}Bettws was an excellent site to choose. The agricultural land there was undulating, affording good views of the surrounding countryside.Clumps of trees have been left to{landscape}the various open spaces within the estate. The{design}of the{houses}varies. Some houses are in rows,others in pairs. There are also small blocks of {flats}and{maisonettes.}Many of the houses have little sheds built-in next to their front doors.Around the edge of the estate there are now small groups of{privately built houses.} The small{shopping centre}provides most essential commodities although litter and vandalism spoil it.
